  • Constructor Details

    • lecturerSignInController

      public lecturerSignInController()

  • Method Details

    • Login

      public void Login(ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Attempts to authenticate the lecturer using provided credentials and logs the lecturer in if successful. Displays appropriate error or success messages based on the authentication result. Closes the login screen upon successful login and opens the lecturer screen. Resets the input fields after login attempt.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the login button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading or writing lecturer data.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the input fields of the lecturer sign-in form. Clears the lecturer ID, password, and user selection fields.

    • showPassword

      public void showPassword()
      Toggles the visibility of the password field between masked and unmasked. Shows the password in plain text when the checkbox is selected. Hides the password and displays masked characters when the checkbox is deselected.

    • userList

      public void userList()
      Populates the user selection dropdown menu with available user types.

    • switchPage

      public void switchPage()
      Switches to a different sign-in page based on the selected user type. Opens the corresponding sign-in form for Student, Admin, or Lecturer. Hides the current sign-in form upon switching.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the lecturer sign in screen interface.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The URL location of the FXML file.
      resources - The resources bundle.
